alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:29PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...DUBUQUE...NORTHEASTERN JONES...DELAWARE AND WESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Luxemburg to Calamus, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Dyersville, Monticello, Cascade, Epworth, Farley, Peosta, Edgewood, Earlville, Hopkinton, Delhi, Lost Nation, Calamus, New Vienna, Colesburg, Worthington, Holy Cross, Greeley, Luxemburg and Rickardsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
